"A.P.242/2/21": "All ARKS! It'll be difficult, but this is a critical moment! Let's all work together and do our best!"
"...Whew. That's it for the fleet-wide notification."
"Great work, Ulc!"

"You did well, Ulc.
Oh, <%me> has arrived."
"Oh, hey there. Sorry for dropping so much in your lap."
"We're doing everything we possibly can... everyone's gotta pitch in."
"Alright, next we... Huh? I feel kinda dizzy..."
"Ulc!"
"Wha- are you alright, Ulc...?!"
"Ahaha, it was nothing, really. Thanks, Theo."
"Don't 'ahaha' me. You're overworking yourself."
"Ah... You think so?"
"You're clearly at your limit. If you keep this up, you're really going to collapse!"
"But if I don't do what I can right now, it'll all have been for nothing. There's no way I can rest."
"...Yes, I suppose so. Alright, we'll keep going. I'll give it everything I've got too."
"Oh? This is new. You usually try to stop me or get cold feet."
"Hahaha... that is true. In the past, I would have tried to make you rest, or have felt discouraged at my uselessness."
"Even now, I still have many doubts. But when I see you working this hard, I get the urge to support you in every way I can."
"I'm going to stay by your side... That's what I've decided."
"...Eheh, hehehe."
"Huh, wh-what? What's wrong, are you okay?"
"As okay as okay gets! In fact, I'm ready to get right back to work! Thanks, Theo!"
"This is all very sweet, but are you sure now is the right time to get all lovey-dovey?"
"Yeah, really."
"Don't be like that, Xiera."
"Think about where you are... I don't mean to butt in, but you two should take this somewhere private!"
"Wh-What do you mean by that! It's not like I'm jealous or anything!"
"Ahaha... Sorry about that. I didn't mean to worry everyone. Everything's alright now!"
"Now's our time to shine! Let's get pumped and push on ahead, to give everyone a future!"
